contentBody.headMarkup:
<!-- Font Family -->
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Rubik&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/salesforce-lightning-design-system.min.css?{ versionKey }" />

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }" />



<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<!-- General -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="<SITE>/favicon?v=2" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{basePath}/assets/css/theme.css?{versionKey}">

<style>
    .topfont {
        color: rgb(25, 135, 84);
        font-size: 18px;
        text-align: center;
        padding-left: 100px;
        background-color: white;
        top: 0px;
    }

    .textbox {
        background-color: white;
    }

    h1 {
        padding-top: 25px;
    }

    h2 {
        padding-top: 25px;
    }

    h3 {
        padding-top: 35px;
    }

    h4 {
        padding-top: 10px;
    }

    .searchbar {
        height: 100px
    }

    .headercontent {
        background-color: rgb(0, 95, 178);
        margin-top: 0px;
    }

    .categories {
        color: #0d6efd;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .madaservices {
        font-size: 20px;
    }

    .categorysection {
        background-color: #e9ecef;
    }

    .festivedecorations {
        border-radius: 50%;
        width: 50%;
    }

    }

    .email {
        text-align: center;
        height: 50px;
    }

    .SubscribeButton {
        position: relative;
        transform: translate(-34%, 0%);
    }

    .ShopDrinkwareButton {
        color: white;
    }

    .details {
        text-align: center;
        color: rgb(25, 135, 84);
        font-weight: bold;
        font-size: 20px;
    }

    .address {
        color: rgb(25, 135, 84);
        font-weight: bold;
        font-size: 20px;
    }

    .footerlogo {
        width: 300px;
        height: 100px;
    }

    .categorybanner {
        width: 1500px;
        height: 200px;
    }

    .greenbox {
        font-family: "Rubik", sans-serif;
    }

    .lwc-4g1q55crn48-host .header.lwc-4g1q55crn48 {
        position: unset !important;
    }

    .slds-button_brand {
        color: white;
    }
    .slds-button_brand:hover, .slds-button_brand:active, .slds-button_brand:focus {
        background-color: #014486;
    }
</style>
